description: The foundation of your skin-to-environment layering system, the Solution 150 Merino Baselayer Crew features NuYarn’s patented stretch merino wool technology, which is warmer and dries substantially faster than traditional merino wool fabrics. The Solution Baselayer Crew also o&ers superior thermoregulation and moisture management, while remaining naturally anti-bacteria and odor resistant.
name: Black Diamond Solution 150 Merino Baselayer Crew - Mens

specs.value: Merino Wool Blend Single Jersey - 78% Merino Wool, 22% Polyester - 150 g
